name: ALIEN DOOD
description:
A Brackeys Game Jam 2021 project.

💾 Theme: Stronger Together

In this game, our big buddy astronaut is on a mission where it is necessary to collect the lost alien doods so we all together can make the tower signal stronger to call the space ship and escape the planet.

🎮 GGJ 2021: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-5

Made in collaboration with :  

✔  Startshums

✔  Philipe

✔  VanillaSpace
